name: Clearing in a Forest
description: You are in a small clearing in a dense forest. The grass is crushed down all around. Narrow trails leads to the north and east.

args: A slight glimmer in the air dissipates as you get your bearings. Before you know it, it's gone.

features.description: There is a small, freshly dug hole here.
onLook: Soft soil is piled next to a 1-foot-wide hole that is only 6 inches deep. The bottom of the hole is rock. Sitting in the center of the hole is a dirty red gemstone.

features.description: It is a roughly cut, pale red gemstone. It's covered in dirt and grime.
onTake: You take the gemstone from the hole and put it in your pocket.
